burnout.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the feeling of always being tired because you have been working too hard
burnout.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Many of the teachers are suffering from burnout.
burnout.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the time when a rocket or jet has finished all of its fuel and stops operating
burnout.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a feeling of extreme tiredness and lack of energy caused by working too hard
burnout.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: With longer vacations you would see less burnout and higher productivity.
burnout.translation[1].definitions[1].de: when people stop doing something because they are tired of doing it or feel they have been asked to do it too much
burnout.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Donor burnout grows as requests for money increase and fewer people can afford to give.
